mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBERS (mem_id, mem_pw, mem_name, mem_birth,mem_profile, mem_phone) VALUES (#{mem_id}, MD5(#{mem_pw}), #{mem_name}, #{mem_birth}, #{mem_profile}, #{mem_phone})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERS WHERE mem_id = #{memId}
SELECT * FROM MEMBERS WHERE mem_id=#{mem_id} and mem_pw=MD5(#{mem_pw})
SELECT * FROM MEMBERS WHERE mem_name=#{mem_name} and mem_phone=#{mem_phone}
SELECT * FROM MEMBERS WHERE mem_id=#{mem_id} and mem_phone=#{mem_phone}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET mem_phone = #{mem_phone} WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
UPDATE MEMBERS SET mem_pw = MD5(#{mem_pw}) WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
UPDATE MEMBERS SET mem_profile = #{imagePath} WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
